Sentence.value: Scar tissue in the pelvis (pelvic adhesions) can also hold the uterus in a retroverted position.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Scar tissue|C0008767]] in the [[pelvis|C0030797]] (pelvic adhesions) can also hold the uterus in a retroverted position.

Sentence.value: Call your health care provider if you have ongoing pelvic pain or discomfort.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Call your [[health care provider|C0018724]] if you have ongoing [[pelvic pain|C0030794]] or discomfort.
